resources.string: This displays the notification when the charge percentage has reached a safe level
Please disconnect the phone from the charger and swipe away this notification.

Instructions of usage :
1) Connect your phone to the charger.
2) Do nothing.
3) The application will alert you when the battery level has reached a safe limit.
4) Disconnect your phone from the charger.
 Note : For devices of Android 8 and above, please follow the given steps :
 i) Go to Settings-> Battery -> SafeCharger
 ii) Select 'Don't optimize' or 'Allow Background Process' (It may vary across devices)
Worst case : If it's still not triggering notifications, then, please have the app. in the background, to receive notifications. Kindly bear with us, we will provide a solution to the above issue ASAP.
